content.rendered:
Most of my friends are human, and I’ve had the privilege of knowing many of them for years, decades, and in a few cases, since the late 60’s. You all know who you are, and out of respect for your privacy, (unlike Facebook) I’m not going to list your names here. However, if it’s been a while, you should drop me an email or call!

The friends that are listed here are furry, playful and have four legs. They want nothing more than food, water, long walks and friendship.

What more could anybody ask?
